body:
Sorry for the lag, we've been trying to figure out what we can offer, and didn't get far.

One thing we know is that we want you guys to end up using fluent. We also know that there's nothing that exists and is proven for your use-case.

Problem space: about:studies is in content, which makes it hard to use code we landed in m-c.We have a [bug 1407418](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1407418) on file to see if we can get goodness exposed, but that doesn't have a timeline yet. Being in-content means that any solution we pick needs to ship within about:studies for the most part, probably.

With fluent, I expect us to figure this out together, but there's no better way than starting and figuring out what we need to fix right now.
